meta.name: Resume
meta.description: This is my resume, structurally somewhat (but not fully) based on the JSON Resume schema (https://jsonresume.org)

basics.name: Inese Avota
basics.subtitle: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience in delivering value across the full software development life cycle. Recognises the importance of clean, maintainable and testable code, and strives to keep up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends. Approachable and enthusiastic individual with a team-building attitude and a sense of urgency and ownership of the product.

highlights: As a member of the core internal tools team developing and maintaining a suite of medical content management applications with focus on containerising and modernising frontend and backend apps, and migration to cloud
Tech stack includes Docker, GCP, Kubernetes, Helm, Istio, Jenkins, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Material UI, Node.js, WebSockets, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Java, Kotlin, Python, Bash
Building a Text Annotation Tool from ground up, an interface for AI powered services that enable the process of medical knowledge acquisition and curation
Project is part of the QURATOR initiative (https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/qurator-ai)
Taking sole ownership of Frontend development including CI pipelines, deployments, monitoring
Tech stack includes React, Redux, redux-saga, styled-components, Jest, TestCafe, Node.js, Jenkins, Travis CI, Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, Sentry, FullStory
Working closely with Product Designers and Backend, NLP and ML engineers

work.name: Lloyds Banking Group
highlights: Greenfield project, designing and building life insurance sales applications
Creating UI with React, Redux, TypeScript, Sass, Jest
Developing backend microservices and RESTful APIs with Node.js, Express
Containerising and instrumenting apps using Docker, Docker Compose, Makefiles
Working within Azure DevOps environment
Contributing to establishing development standards within the team
Helping organise Agile and Scrum processes within the team
Pair-programming, XP practices

work.name: NCR Corporation
highlights: Production incident investigation and bug fixing for marketing services within online banking applications
Enhancing backend solutions in Java (Spring, Maven) and Scala (functional paradigm)
Developing new frontend features and components with React, Redux, CSS in JS and testing with Mocha, Chai, Sinon, Enzyme
Automated E2E testing with TestCafe, cross-browser testing with Sauce Labs, and some exposure to performance testing with JMeter
Training Tier 1 Support team in application usage, Splunk log analysis and troubleshooting
Participating in Scrum activities, hackathons, guilds, creating tech culture

work.name: Petrotechnics (now Sphera)
highlights: Developing and maintaining risk management software in Java (Java 8, Struts 2), Groovy, JavaScript (Ext JS), HTML5, CSS3
Oracle database design and development
Strong focus on applying OO principles and design patterns
Taking part in requirements engineering, working closely with POs, Business Analysts and UX designers
